channel.title: Project P2P auto catcher
channel.description:
duno if im allowed to post this here but w/e
[code]Simple auto catcher bot.
Keys: F5 - Eat Shark F6 - Autocatcher on/off (last player attacked) F7 - Attack last player attacked (auto catcher can sometimes be slow to attack so press this button)
Might add auto eat and prayer hot keys later but for now just use F5 to eat shark.[/code]
http://rapidshare.com/files/131268214/Maced.rar.html

item.title: Project P2P auto catcher
item.dc:creator: @auroa auroa
item.description:
@auroa wrote:

[quote=“Krypton, post:24, topic:221467”][quote author=auroa link=topic=290744.msg2346220#msg2346220 date=1216758313]

lol jagex would of never stopped autoing on rsc
1…to many
2…they never look for them
3…they dont even care about reports

lol…but i dont see why they wasted so much time on rs2
they made it fail, running while in fights or eating?? protect from melee?
ice barage ?? rofl what kinda of shit is u freeze sum1 for 15 seconds
thats total BS

Don’t post about things you don’t know.

word. This 1shot kid probably wasn’t even around when rsc got keelled. If jagex couldn’t stop autoing then how are people with crappy RSC SERVERS stopping bots from logging in to the server? If they really wanted to stop autoing, it would have been done. They were just busy with rs2. They did care about reports, that’s how they banned a lot of people. You didn’t play runescape at all, did you even play rs2? You are talking shit about that, and that aint true either you fucking idiot. You never played runescape, gtfo low life.
[/quote]
Just because he knows nothing about java and he doesn’t know you can in fact prevent macroing doesn’t mean he didn’t play the original RSC, I cant even think why you would say something like that?

To 1shot:
Jagex didn’t have to ban all the macroers to prevent it, they just have to create a better anti-cheat system so it detects the bots or doesn’t let people even log on to bots on the server.[/quote]
Listen to him, “they didn’t even try”? That’s a class A example of a failed attempt.

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P auto catcher
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote=“elyad, post:8, topic:221467”][quote author=Peter link=topic=290744.msg2344447#msg2344447 date=1216673310]

Why post an AC? Want to kill the community even more?

Disabling bots from function on your server isn’t hard. Having these bots around will push people into real development, not just random XML editing.
[/quote]

Its just a pointless post, like 1shot said, its whole reason why RSC became utter shit, RSC was abandoned, and then came the autoers, Thought this place was to re-build an RSC community again, and rebuild the game us people loved? Not come here and destroy it again with pointless bots, and ac’s. For 1 there is already a bug in RSCD v25, You can pratically ac without a bot. Why would you want to ac? What would be the point of pking? Exactly, there wouldnt be. And why auto? Takes u what, a few days to max on most of these servers nowadays? Basically all im saying is, posting a bot shouldnt really be allowed here.[/quote]

RSC was abandoned, and then came the autoers. Pick up a book, read a tutorial or two and start learning Java. RSC private server DEVELOPMENT is more or less dead. The only “real” server I’ve seen is HixkPK/EnvyOnline(Although not RSCD). There’s a fucking amazing RSC private server base public (RSCD for the people that didn’t catch on). It’s a lot further then any RS2 private server I’ve seen around and I still dare to say RS2 private server DEVELOPMENT is a lot more advanced then ours.

Now instead of crying about something you CANNOT change anyways [as in, people will not stop writing bots because you cry], try picking up a book and learn and develop.

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P auto catcher
item.dc:creator: @Krypton1 Krypton
item.description:
@Krypton1 wrote:

[quote=“elyad, post:8, topic:221467”][quote author=Peter link=topic=290744.msg2344447#msg2344447 date=1216673310]

Why post an AC? Want to kill the community even more?

Disabling bots from function on your server isn’t hard. Having these bots around will push people into real development, not just random XML editing.
[/quote]

Its just a pointless post, like 1shot said, its whole reason why RSC became utter shit, RSC was abandoned, and then came the autoers, Thought this place was to re-build an RSC community again, and rebuild the game us people loved? Not come here and destroy it again with pointless bots, and ac’s. For 1 there is already a bug in RSCD v25, You can pratically ac without a bot. Why would you want to ac? What would be the point of pking? Exactly, there wouldnt be. And why auto? Takes u what, a few days to max on most of these servers nowadays? Basically all im saying is, posting a bot shouldnt really be allowed here.[/quote]
First off, Jagex could of stopped the autoers if they even bothered, they were just too busy creating a newer and more advanced version of their game. Second, what Peter said SHOULD be what is happening, but I believe 95% of the servers posted on this site are the people just trying to get “e-rep” or make a few bucks off creating a private server. I assume this server is part of he 95% of servers who’s creator cant do anything outside the XML part of the source…

Read full topic
